message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
You're being too generous, Bob! I'll make a better offer in the next round.
You're being too soft, Bob! I'm taking a bigger slice of the pie this time.
I'm not giving up, Alice! You can't have it all!
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob! I'll stick to my guns and wait for a better offer.
You're running out of time, Bob! I'm taking a bigger slice of the pie before it's too late.
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a small slice now, but I'll come back stronger in the next round!
Alright, Bob, you've got a deal! But don't think you're getting off that easy!
